text.content: Isn't she lovely  Isn't she wonderful  Isn't she precious  Less than one minute old  I never thought through love we'd be  Making one as lovely as she  But isn't she lovely made from love  Isn't she pretty  Truly the angel's best  Boy, I'm so happy  We have been heaven blessed  I can't believe what God has done  Through us he's given life to one  But isn't she lovely made from love  Isn't she lovely  Life and love are the same  Life is Aisha  The meaning of her name  Londie, it could have not been done  Without you who conceived the one  That's so very lovely made from love
